original_title: Aretha! A Grammy Celebration for the Queen of Soul
overview: Tyler Perry hosts a tribute to the singer's legendary career, featuring performances from Yolanda Adams, Shirley Caesar, Alessia Cara, Kelly Clarkson, Common, Celine Dion, Jennifer Hudson, Alicia Keys, John Legend, Patti LaBelle and more.
title: Aretha! A Grammy Celebration for the Queen of Soul
